ComicInfo.Summary:
The Green Behemoth slugs his way out of the clutches of Tyrannus!
After the battle with Tyrannus, Goldbug escapes only to find himself face to face with Power Man and Iron Fist. Glenn Talbot gets promoted to colonel and vows to stop the Hulk.
